git_questions.question: What command is used to create a new Git repository?
How do you stage changes for commit in Git?
What command would you use to view the commit history?
What command will you use to clone a repository?
Which command is used to remove a file from the staging area?
How would you create a new branch in Git?
What does 'git merge' do?
options: Combines changes from one branch into another
git_questions.correct_answer: Combines changes from one branch into another

git_questions.question: How can you view all branches in your repository?
Which command is used to push your changes to a remote repository?
What is a remote in Git?
options: A version of your repository hosted on the internet
A branch on your local repository
git_questions.correct_answer: A version of your repository hosted on the internet
